develop.from sentence: We develop MAMCN using Tensorflow 1 deep learning framework and Sonnet 2 library .

word - level embedding.from sentence: For the word - level embedding , we tokenize the documents using NLTK toolkit and substitute words with GloVe 6B 43.16 46.90 49.28 55.83 BiDAF 40.32 45.91 44.86 50.71 hidden size is set to 200 for QUASAR - T and Triv - iaQA , and 100 for SQuAD .

memory controller.from sentence: In the memory controller , we use 100 x 36 size memory initialized with zeros , 4 read heads and 1 write head .

optimizer.from sentence: The optimizer is AdaDelta ( Zeiler , 2012 ) with an initial learning rate of 0.5 .

train.from sentence: We train our model for 12 epochs , and batch size is set to 30 .

exponential moving average.from sentence: During the training , we keep the exponential moving average of weights with 0.001 decay and use these averages at test time .
